description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref:P1896.20 dated 16/08/2021 to allow for amendments to approved plans (See cover letter)(Application for reserved matters seeking approval of access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale in respect of a 2 form entry Primary School together with a 30 place FTE nursery, 12 place Additional Resource Provision, a MUGA and informal play space; pursuant to Condition 1, 7, 18, 26, 38, 48 and 66 of the Section 73 Planning Permission Reference P1125.19 dated 14 January 2020 for Variation of Conditions 5 (Approved Plans) and 7 (Phasing Plan) of Planning Permission Reference P1242.17 (GLA Ref: GLA/2933a/05) to allow amendments to the site area located within the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham. Details are provided to satisfy Conditions 11, 12, 13, 16, 24, 31, 32, 34, 41, 52, 53, 55, 56, 60, 63, 67, 69 and 70 of Planning Permission Reference P1125.19)
site_name: Beam Park, Former Ford Assembly Plant Site
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed in the report are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.

a) The cornered wall was moved slightly to the west, so that the services would be positioned outside of the school wall boundary. It was logical for these services to be positioned outside of this boundary to prevent the need to request access through the school for maintenance resources
b) To reflect the movement of the wall, the gate was given additional space to the east to allow sufficient clearance.
c) To also reflect the repositioning of the wall the tree which was positioned adjacent to the gate has been relocated to the cycle storage location within the southern side of the MUGA.
d) An External Store, referenced as '8. External Storage B91.330' on the Landscape Layout Plan, is relocated from the south of the hard play area to the south of MUGA.
